column3: utACK 46544c60d67d8a7095e7243795d2b570ab8391e3. InterruptibleRecv goes away soon as part of the async connection work, but having the SOCKS constants defined will make those changes much easier to review. Thanks for saving me a step :)
Funny, in windows 2nd arg is `char*`, that's why the build failed.
Oops, thought it would be void, added the wrong cast. Should be ok now.
